segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a stool that doesn't look very stable, and that worries me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, waiting for her treat, and she looks so happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement in her eyes as she watches her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still by the sink, not noticing anything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she will turn around soon and catch the kids in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, making the floor more and more slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the kids don't slip and fall while reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really focused on the cookie jar, not paying attention to anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are both being very sneaky and quiet, trying not to get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears if they're not careful and something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
